mapper.select: SELECT um.uuid, um.username, um.nickname, um.phone, um.avatar, um.avatar, um.blog, um.email, um.gender, um.remark, um.occupation, um.state, um.role_id, cuw.fabulous_count, cuw.collection_count, cuw.follow_count, cuw.fans_count, cuw.fans_count, cuw.comment_count, cuw.article_count, cuw.special_column_count, cuw.circle_count FROM user_main AS um LEFT JOIN count_user_website AS cuw ON um.uuid = cuw.uuid WHERE um.uuid = #{uuid}
